items.title: 'We're under attack by billionaires': Fired federal workers speak out on terminations
items.description: Hanna Hickman, a now-terminated worker for the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, told ABC News the last four days have been a roller coaster.

items.title: Netanyahu to convene security cabinet after release of 3 hostages
items.description: Hamas militants released three more Israeli hostages on Saturday as part of the ceasefire agreement.

items.title: WATCH:  Animals enjoy Valentine's treats at Florida aquarium
items.description: Animals at Tampa's Florida Aquarium enjoyed Valentine's Day treats, including heart-shaped strawberries and ice treats with their favorite snacks.

items.title: WATCH:  Hamas releases 3 more hostages, including American Sagui Dekel Chen
items.description: Just hours ago, Hamas freed three more hostages, including American Sagui Dekel Chen. Israel, in turn, released hundreds of Palestinian prisoners.

items.title: Federal judge hands Muskâ€™s DOGE a win on data access at 3 agencies
items.description: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency can continue to access sensitive records from at least three federal agencies, a judge ruled.
